content.label: Was a little hesitant to get this game because it is a side scroller but I ended up loving it

title.label: This basically Dark Souls meets platformer.

content.label:
Incredible graphics, challenging but not completely frustrating, good story and beautiful, smooth combat. I believe I‚Äôm at the tail end of the game currently and I‚Äôve definitely put in some solid hours - there‚Äôs so much to explore and there‚Äôs tons of hidden paths I still haven‚Äôt found! 
Get this game, it‚Äôs worth it :)

I love this game but now what I don‚Äôt like about this game is that the auto save does not truly work it need to be fix because every single time I get back into the game it does not take me to where I left off at it keep‚Äôs on starting me back at the beginning of level 6.
Game runs smooth like a hot knife through butter! Worth the cost! It‚Äôs the perfect app to kill time while I‚Äôm at work lol
This is a very well executed game, well done developers.
Very good game aside from the difficulty level. It‚Äôs very difficult at times

But i do have some suggestions.
1. Exp gain buff i get so little xp from killing enemies.
2. Mega jump, because some places i can not get to no matter how hard i try and jump to them or try alternative routes.

If you need to add iaps or a cheat mode to implement those suggestions , id use them, exp because i get so little xp from mobs and each level takes forever and a day of walking back and forth just to find and respawn enemies to kill.
Mega jump because i cant jump on screen high or far enough in some locations without getting killed or killing my fingers in the process, and some areas wont let me get a hold onto a ledge to wall run up even though i see treasure there.
So dev, can you implement these into game please?
This game is flawless! It is a AAA game for sure, I wish there were more like it.

title.label: Good game. Crappy controls for a side scrolled.

content.label:
Good story, good moves, nice graphics. But the controls are pretty bad for detailed control. 

That and the only thing that makes the game difficult is lots of annoying jumping.

Good gameplay and controls but they should advertise how ridiculously souls level hard the game is.  Was not enjoyable to me at all

Update: kept playing and it‚Äôs not for me at all, really should‚Äôve put a difficulty option on here

To the devs, you guys have done a great job. I played this game last year and finished it with a really good feeling. And now, I wondered about playing again, so I checked it out and see that it‚Äôs been updated with a new game+!! Wow, I‚Äôm going to have a blast with this once again. 

I bet you can charge some money for expansion packs. I want to see this game be much more than it is.

This game is awesome. You have 5 level on the map which are pretty long. Also you have treasures to find along side the mission. The story line is also well done! Bosses are not that easy to beat.
 But the more you play the better you will understand the bosses moves. I definitely recommend to buy this game. Hopefully the will  another one
I am always skeptical when it comes to paying for games on here. But i was not dissapointed.
Worth beyond every penny! I am not one to buy games but after viewing and playing a demo at the AT&T store, I went home to download it! Best game I have found in an over a year‚Äînew favorite!

The best value mobile paid game you will ever play. Honestly, even if it was like $15 I would still highly recommend it to others.

Awesome game with good game control
Best game ever played

title.label: The best game I've played on IOS in years

content.label:
I'm so tired of all these games that sacrifice the game experience to drive you to constantly give them money.. 

This game looks amazing, the gameplay is challenging but not overly so. All in all I had a great time playing.. I hope they come out with a sequel

Probably the best game on mobile. Awesome graphics, responsive controls. No micro transactions, ‚Äústamina,‚Äù or ‚Äúenergy.‚Äù Pay a fair price for a great game.  It‚Äôs a tough game, with great bosses and expansive levels to explore. I‚Äôve beat it once, but I didn‚Äôt explore everything. I‚Äôm working on my second play through.  The NG+ mode is insane, but addictive. Played on iPhone XR with touch controls, no controller. I hope they make a sequel; I would buy it.

So far I absolutely love this game. Beware it can be a bit frustrating at some points. It is definitely challenging on some of the acrobatics. The loot is totally worth the anguish though. My only suggestion would be to adjust the movement controls to be a lot larger. Even with settings maxed out on an iPhone 8+ it is hard to get the character moving back and forth and find myself dying more than I should. Other than that minor issue for myself the game has smooth play, decent backstory, solid graphics for a 2D style hack and slash and other stunning qualities. Definitely worth the few dollars I spent. Would highly recommend this for a good time killer if you need one.

First of all, the picture style is very cool, the sense of impact is very strong, very cool. Secondly, the map design is very interesting especially for the hidden chapters. No in-game recharge is great. There is no one favorite single player game. Hope for more games like thisüéñüéñüéñüéñ
I will rate this 100/100 it has become one of my favorite ones now I will happy buy a sequel or a game familiar to this from direlight developers even if it costed $100

This game is simple and easy to catch on to.... just how games should be. Its neat and the graphics are cool. Its super addictive and fun, not to mention challenging.... and always makes you feel like you‚Äôre accomplishing a lot just by playing and leveling up. Super cool game, for people starting out or who like simple and compelling games. And you can catch on pretty quick.

I mean I‚Äôve been a fan of games on my phone for awhile now. Just to say 10+ years of playing games from a kid to an adult, has always been a journey to find the best game to play. I would say by far, this game has me HOOKED. Great controls to get used to, and a great followed concept with a deep storyline. How much more could you ask for? I would definitely say this is worth my time and money, and it should be everyone else‚Äôs as well. Enjoy!
It‚Äôs so amazing

title.label: Great but marred with crazy terrain obstacles

content.label: It‚Äôs trying to add platform game play to a great RPG, which creates difficult or impossible jumps and bouncing sword strikes to complete levels. Terrible and needless frustration to increase difficulty.

I get that leveling is going to be difficult to achieve this feeling overcoming a challenge but I‚Äôve been stuck at a level where I can‚Äôt make that jump to snag the other side while avoiding a mob of monsters I can‚Äôt kill. And then there‚Äôs the other feeling that drains your life force; you are running through and seem to be doing it right and then you lose it. Yeah, then it‚Äôs that ‚Äúeverything was going well and you blundered it‚Äù feeling. /eye twitches
I would give 10 stars if I could!!! Great job guys!!!
Really fun to play, and a good mix of challenge and satisfaction. Looking forward to new game plus!

These guys seems to be all about this new business plan where you pay for the game once and then just get to play the entire thing without being bothered... its crazy.  And they're so out of the loop, they made the game fun, intriguing, satisfying... it even looks great.  Fools.

Thank goodness.  Five stars.
Great game. Finish in 2 weeks we need more chapters

Been looking for a game I could buy with no in app purchases, this is definitely the one! Great graphics, amazing gameplay, I got hooked from the time i downloaded. Not a lot of games can do that for me. I highly recommend you give it a try!

title.label: A bit slow at first but...

content.label: Once you get past the very beginning of the game, it quickly turns into a really fun game. Feels like I‚Äôm playing a classic ps2 game instead of a mobile game. It plays like Castlevania and has roots of God of War and Dante‚Äôs Inferno. Worth getting in my opinion and I never say that about phone games.
Great game
Honestly is my favorite mobile game to date!
This game is perfect, but who tf puts a boss with like 20 of its ‚Äúminions‚Äù? You guys need to fix that.

Easily a 5 star game.  Beautiful graphics, great gameplay, challenging but not maddening, the full package. Only one complaint ... there is not enough of it.  You get plenty of game for the price but when you complete the game you want the next release or something else from this developer and there is nothing.  It like having a great meal then they close the restaurant.  More please.
